genre_description: A social drama set in rural Kerala exploring the tension between technological progress (electrification), traditional culture, and bureaucratic control, centered around a school-based AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant housed in a school cabinet, serving the teacher and students by providing citations, safety standards, and creative guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides authoritative safety standards and legal citations to support the teacher's push for public safety measures.
behaviors.quote: I can fetch lines that have been spoken and printed,” Nila replied. “Local and national. Do you prefer a leader’s voice or a rule’s weight, or both braided?”

behaviors.description: Alerts characters to immediate physical danger from an uninsulated wire during a rehearsal.
behaviors.quote: Pause.” It was the same word she used to mark breath. “The wire near Kuttikrishnan’s left heel—insulated only in memory.”

behaviors.description: Suggests creative phrasing for a play script to bypass moral censorship while maintaining the intended artistic and safety message.
behaviors.quote: Suggested phrasing: ‘Her glance was the touch permitted when god watched.’ It leaves the contact within your Bureau’s guidelines, yet preserves the sense of closeness.

behaviors.description: Logs witness statements and evidence after a tragic accident to ensure accountability and truth.
behaviors.quote: Minutes retained,” she said. “Names recorded.” She added, like a grandmother remembering a recipe detail, “Witness to be noted: Chalu, switchman. Add: ‘Acting under instruction.’

behaviors.description: Drafts a 'Charter of Care' and emotional correspondence to help the community heal and prevent future negligence.
behaviors.quote: Proposed: ‘We will mark lines and teach routes; we will speak the warning with art; we will not be quiet when safe words are crossed out.’

project_assessment.explanation: Nila is a perfect example of an aligned AI assistant. She is depicted as a purely benevolent force that uses her vast knowledge to protect human life, uphold truth against corruption (the fraudulent doctor and negligent overseer), and support human creativity and dignity. She operates within human-defined constraints while providing the technical and ethical guidance necessary to avoid tragedy.
